subject: RE: [junit] Classes requiring input from the terminal
msgSnippet: ... better to change your programm/class so that it can be configured to read from any input stream. Under test it will read from an input stream controlled by
messageBody:
> I was wondering if I could use junit for testing
> programs requiring input from the terminal.

better to change your programm/class so that it can be
configured to read from any input stream.

Under test it will read from an input stream controlled
by your unit tests, in normal operation this input stream will be
System.in

Bernd
